projectGridLines.stationName: TERAWATT TESTING AND RESEARCH INSTITUTE PRIVATE LIMITED
projectGridLines.title: Implementation of ISO/IEC17025: 2017
projectGridLines.description:
Description: ISO/IEC17025: 2017 defines the general requirements for the competence of testing and

calibration laboratories

Skill sets: MS Office Suite,

Traits expectation:

Expected learning:

? Implementation of Quality aspects as per ISO/IEC 17025:2017 in a testing/calibration

laboratory.

? Learning about lab accreditation

? Database management

? Personnel management

? Preparing test reports

Specific courses required for project execution: Should go through ISO 17025:2017, ISO 9001:2015

standard, Guide to the expression of uncertainty in measurement, Basic knowledge of Solar PV

panels and pumps

projectGridLines.stationName: TERAWATT TESTING AND RESEARCH INSTITUTE PRIVATE LIMITED
projectGridLines.title: Implementation of testing setup as per BIS Standards for Water Pumping Systems and Solar PV  Modules
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

Skill sets: Electrical connections and working with DC and AC Energy.

Traits expectation: Knowledge of Motor designs

Expected learning:

? Testing of Water Pumping Systems for Hydraulic as well as electrical testing using Solar Array

Simulators.

? Testing of Solar PV Modules

? Calibration of measuring equipment

? Preparing test reports

? Calculation of Measurement uncertainty

? Maintenance of equipment

Specific courses required for project execution: Should go through ISO 17025:2017, ISO 9001:2015

standard, Guide to the expression of uncertainty in measurement, Basic knowledge of Solar PV

panels and pumps, IEC 61215/IS14286, IEC60904, IS 12762, IS 8034, IS 9283, IS 11346, IEC 62253.
